rules_text:
This creature enters with a number of +1/+1 counters equal to X plus the number of other spells you cast this turn.
Storm [i](When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. Copies become tokens.)[/i]
Foretell {X}{U} [i](During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)[/i]
